title: wine_Santa_Ema_2005_Rivalta_Limited_Selection_Red_(Cachapoal_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 50626.
country: Chile.
description: The Carmen√®re in this Carm-Cabernet-Syrah blend is the lead singer, so expect a touch of minty green and herbal essence. It's a heavyweight in the sense that the mouthfeel is big and the tannins are a little hard. But with airing it unveils classy, spicy berry flavors and wood-based accents of vanilla and butter (20 months in new oak will do that). A big wine that needs some airing. Ready now but can rest well in the cellar for a few more years..
designation: Rivalta Limited Selection.
points: 91.

province: Cachapoal Valley.
